definition[0]: likely to suffer from a particular illness or be affected by a particular problem
example[0]: Older people are more susceptible to infections.
example[1]: Soil on the mountain slopes is very susceptible to erosion.
definition[1]: a susceptible person is easily influenced or attracted by someone or something
example[2]: A lot of TV advertising is aimed at susceptible young children.
example[3]: She was very susceptible to flattery.
